nodes.label: Draw two habitats and the different living things in each
Land habitat: Deciduous tree, bushes, grass, squirrel, lizard, ants
Water habitat: Lake, cattails, algae, trout
Correctly identifies and draws a land habitat with living things
Correctly identifies and draws a water habitat with living things
Illustrates similarities and differences in plant life between habitats
May need further labeling of species and size accuracy
Consider more detailed species labels and accurate sizes for organisms
